attachments.fallback:
patch 8.0.0056
Problem:    When setting 'filetype' there is no check for a valid name.
Solution:   Only allow valid characters in 'filetype', 'syntax' and 'keymap'.
attachments.title: patch 8.0.0056
attachments.text:
patch 8.0.0056
Problem:    When setting 'filetype' there is no check for a valid name.
Solution:   Only allow valid characters in 'filetype', 'syntax' and 'keymap'.
